snippets.name: Hide Brackets in Product Count in the Product Category Layout and Append Translatable String Product in WooCommerce
snippets.desc: https://gist.github.com/paketos/cd44963da0680a9120b1c2b32fb44e28 This snippet is doing 2 things: 1 hide brackets for the product count in the product category layout, 2 append translatable string product (singular or plural) depending on the number of products i.e. 1 or more.
